Game.Name: Super Chinese 2 - Dragon Kid (Japan)
Game.plot: Start out on a journey. You are spirited Ninja boys, Jack and Ryu. Now, go out on your journey to save the once merry world, Chinaland!Cheat: No-Encounters and Walk Through WallsHold Right + A + Select + Start, then press Reset. Now, during the game, while walking on the map, hold Start to disable random encounters. While walking on any stages, including in fighting mode, hold Select to free move through the walls.Cheat: Ending Password (Japanese Version)At the password screen, press Down 2 times and enter the Japanese character. Up 2 times, Right 1 time and enter the Japanese character. Up 1 time, Left 2 times and enter the Japanese character. Now hit "End".
